data.title: Object placement improvements
data.body: Add a 'drop at camera'  and 'drop at camera with rotation' option (rotation should only be on the y axis)

data.title: Animation sharing between FBX/Blender/etc +Submesh visibility editing
Add FOV settings to camera in the Scene view
Update camera rotation in scene view
data.body:
- Allow the camera to rotate in the scene view infinitely. If you continue pushing the cursor along the border of the editor, while holding down the right mouse button, the camera should keep rotating.
- We may want to switch the mouse cursor to another icon

data.title: Switch to Windows subsystem, instead of console for AtomicEditor (See Notes)
data.body: IMPORTANT:  Make sure AtomicEditor.exe process is also exiting cleanly (no zombies in the Task Manager)

data.title: Hierarchy Frame -> Right Click -> Duplicate on root Scene node crashes editor
Fix copyright on WebRequest, use UIWidgetEditComplete on array widget
Build (failure) improvements
Command line builds need to be able to generate the cache, so  the project doesn't need to be loaded into the Editor first
Fix 'X' key shortcut with multiple scenes open
Release renderImage after renderSurface
Added deselect functionality to the scene view
Inspector view behavior improvements
data.body:
- Tabbing between fields should highlight the entire value in that field
- Use the 'enter' key on checkbox fields to check/uncheck
- Use arrow keys to quickly navigate a field: up (start of selection), down (end of selection), right (move cursor one space to the right), left (move cursor one space to the left)
- Use the 'enter' key to expand/collapse a component (only when the component name is the active selection)
- Use arrow keys on fields that have a dropdown menu (i.e. Create Component)
- Prevent the inspector pane from scrolling side to side (see the model import)

data.title: Updated buttons on Unsaved Modification window
Create a WebView component using the Chromium Embedded Framework
Remove namespace qualification
Fix stanhull return
Player setup doesn't override engine parameters, constants for .pak file extensions.
Cubemap Generation
Unnecessary Editor menus should be disabled when no scene is open
data.body: All menus other than "Atomic Editor", "File" and "Developer" should be disabled when no scene is open in the editor.

data.title: Control of/syncronization with Player process from editor
data.body:
Artists find it helpful to be able to view a playing scene from different angles. To this end would be good to:
1) Be able to pause and frame step the player when playing in the editor
2) Have the editor synchronize it's state with the player (yeah, massive). With the complete separationg of the editor and player processes (excluding IPC) the simplest way to achieve this would likely be to have a separate window linked to the player process that renders the same scene as the main player viewport but with a controllable camera. Alternatively, having a means to syncronize objects between the player and the editor-perhaps this would form the basis of networked object sync as well?

data.title: Add runtime player mode information
data.body:
Whether in a deployed app or in the editor's play mode
Path information
Vendor/Company info
Product info
etc

data.title: Add confirmation to Prefab Break
data.body: This is (currently) an undoable operation which also wipes undo history for the node and children, so it should have a confirmation describing this

data.title: Renderer2D component in Scene node, causes a index buffer lock error on resize if no 2D in scene
data.body: To reproduce add a Renderer2D component to Roboman3D scene node.  This error happens when no 2D in scene with a Renderer2D component

data.title: Scoping variables in js_push_variant
data.body: I looked at this function a bit deeper, and I noticed that there were a good number of copies out of the variant, and it constructed all of the possible temporary variables whether it used them or not. It now only copies the variable out of the Variant once, and it only constructs a temporary type when it's needed.

data.title: Add ability to create cubemaps
data.body: Unless I missed it, there's no way to create cubemaps in the editor.

data.title: World/Local Axis 'X' key shortcut non-functional with multiple scenes open
Multi-Edit Support
data.body:
- Editing of multiple nodes/components simultaneously
- New undo/redo system which handles multi-editing
- Undo/Redo for prefab break and component deletion
- Remember component section states between nodes
- New attribute widget data binding system
- ResourceRefList inspector widget
- UIListView improvements to handle multiple selection
- Selection cut operation
- New mainframe menu items and keyboard focus fixes
- Numerous misc fixes (dragging nodes in hierarchy frame, etc)

data.title: Closing files sometimes closes the project
data.body:
- It happens after making changes in the inspector
- The file doesn't show any unsaved changes
- Once it happens it affects all files in all projects until the editor is restarted
